title: Gabrielle Rise Again 2020 UK tour dates and tickets
text:
Gabrielle is returning for a 2020 UK tour (Picture: Getty)

Gabrielle has announced a new tour to celebrate 20 years of her hit album Rise, as she prepares to hit the road throughout November 2020.

The Dreams star, 49, will be touring the UK from 12-27 November 2020, and told her fans she wanted to do the dates to celebrate 20 years of the iconic record.

Gabrielle revealed: ‘I’m so excited about going on the road and celebrating 20 years of the Rise album being released.

‘I’m looking forward to performing songs from Rise alongside lots of my other favourites and of course I could never end a show without playing Dreams. It’s going to be a big party full of good vibes and memories.’

The Rise Again UK tour follows on from her sixth studio album, Under My Skin, which was released last year, her first in 11 years.

She previously revealed that her management had doubted Rise would ever be successful, telling Bang Showbiz: ‘I remember Rise coming out and my manager said it wasn’t going to be a hit.

Advertisement

Advertisement

‘I am not with him anymore. Rise came out and it was this huge success. The fact my manager said it wasn’t going to be a hit, you can never predict it.’

Tickets for ‘The Rise Again Tour’ go on sale on Friday 18 October from 9am.

Gabrielle's Rise Again tour dates 2020: November 12th – Gateshead, Sage

November 13th – York, Barbican

November 15th – Salford, Lowry

November 16th – Liverpool, Philharmonic Hall

November 17th – Glasgow, Royal Concert Hall

November 20th – Southend, Cliffs Pavilion

November 21st – Birmingham, Town Hall

November 23rd – Leicester, De Montfort Hall

November 24th – Brighton, Dome

November 25th – London, indigo at The O2

November 27th – Dublin, Olympia

description: Gabrielle will be touring the UK to mark 20 years of her hit album Rise in 2020, tickets go on sale on Friday 18 October at 9am.
